actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to increase the amount of attorney fees payable in certain cases relating to claims to land on Guam and to extend the statute of limitations for such claims.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to territories to: (1) increase the amount of attorneys' fees payable in certain cases relating to land claims on Guam; and (2) extend the statute of limitations for such claims.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount of attorney fees payable in certain cases relating to claims to land on Guam and to extend the statute of limitations for such claims.
